Package gameplay.attacks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attack
    A damaging or status-causing effect that an Avatar can create
    Fireball
    A fireball projectile that can be created by an Avatar
    Howl  
    Lightning  
    Lunge  
    MeleeAttack  
    MovingSprite
    Shelby's MovingImage class for our convenience
    Projectile
    A moving Attack that moves on its own and does something on impact with an Avatar
    SnowField  
    StatusEffect
    Represents a possible StatusEffect for an Attack to apply to an Avatar
    TrailingAttack
    An Attack that follows an Avatar
    Trap  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Attack.AttackResult
    The possible results of an Attack when it hits an Avatar
    StatusEffect.Effect
    Possible Effects for a StatusEffect
